notes_text: In 2016, the Ministry of Civil Affairs formed a task force to explore the legalization of cannabis and cannabinoids for medicinal purposes.
notes: In 2016, the Ministry of Civil Affairs formed a task force to explore the legalization of cannabis and cannabinoids for medicinal purposes.
notes_raw: {{main|Cannabis in Bosnia and Herzegovina}} In 2016, the Ministry of Civil Affairs formed a task force to explore the legalization of cannabis and [[cannabinoids]] for medicinal purposes.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www.bosniatoday.ba/bosnia-to-legalize-medical-marijuana-this-year/ |title=Bosnia to legalize medical marijuana this year |website=Bosnia Today |access-date=30 November 2016 |url-status=dead |archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20160924221422/http://www.bosniatoday.ba/bosnia-to-legalize-medical-marijuana-this-year/ |archive-date=24 September 2016}}</ref><ref>{{cite web |url=https://n1info.hr/regija/bih-legalizirala-medicinski-kanabis/ |title=BiH legalizirala medicinski kanabis |language=bs |website=n1info.hr |date=2025-12-29 |access-date=2026-01-10}}</ref>
